title: Rock Star
description: Music was their business - pleasure was their game.Rock Star blows the lid off the hard-driving lifestyles of today's music superstars.Kris Phoenix - The legendary and wildly sexy guitar hero,Bobby Mondella - Black soul superstar with a past,Rafealla - An exotically beautiful girl who comes between them with a vengeance.Rock Star takes you on a dangerous trip through the jungle of broken dreams and blackmail, hit records and hit men...a jungle of sex, drugs and rock 'n' roll.Rock Star is a love story that burns.Feel the heat...
author: Jackie Collins
